properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Upokee sadaka yetu —
twakutolea Baba.
Upokee navyo vipaji —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pokea Baba zawadi,
Pokea Baba zawadi,
twakutolea Baba. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Upokee mkate wetu —
twakutolea Baba.
Upokee divai yetu —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Upokee mazao yetu —
twakutolea Baba.
Upokee na fedha zetu —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nasi pia ni mali yako —
twakutolea Baba.
Tunatubu makosa yetu —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Upokee mioyo yetu —
twakutolea Baba.
Upokee na nafsi zetu —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Haya yote ni mali yako —
twakutolea Baba.
Uyapokee kwa huruma —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Uviunge vipaji vyetu —
twakutolea Baba.
Na sadaka yake mwanao —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Usifiwe ewe mtukufu —
twakutolea Baba.
Kwa sadaka yake na yetu —
twakutolea Baba.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Tuhurumie wakosefu —
twakutolea Baba.
Tuletee baraka yako —
twakutolea Baba.
